    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_sl/130086</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Gravitacijski zakon v bližini površja Zemlje</string>
            <string language="en">Law of gravity near the surface of the earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz von Schwerkraft nahe der Oberfläche der 
Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Loi de la pesanteur près de la surface de la 
terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lei da gravidade perto da superfície da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legge di gravità vicino alla superficie della 
terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νόμος της βαρύτητας κοντά στην επιφάνεια της γης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ley de la gravedad cerca de la superficie de la 
tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poenostavitev gravitacijskega zakona v bližini površja Zemlje za male objekte in definicija sile teže.</string>
            <string language="en">Simplification of law of gravitation in proximity of Earth's surface for small objects and definition of weight force.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sila teže</string>
            <string language="en">weight force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gravitacijski zakon</string>
            <string language="en">law of gravitation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vereinfachung des Gesetzes der Gravitation in der
Nähe der Oberfläche der Masse für kleine Nachrichten und in der 
Definition der Gewichtkraft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Simplification de loi d'attraction universelle 
dans la proximité de la surface de la terre pour de petits objets et 
la définition de la force de poids.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simplificação da lei da gravitação na 
proximidade da superfície da terra para objetos pequenos e na 
definição da força do peso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Semplificazione di legge di gravitazione nella 
prossimità della superficie della terra per i piccoli oggetti e nella
definizione della forza del peso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλοποίηση του νόμου της βαρύτητας στην εγγύτητα της 
γήινης επιφάνειας για τα μικρά αντικείμενα και τον καθορισμό της 
δύναμης βάρους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simplificación de la ley de la gravitación en 
la proximidad de la superficie de la tierra para los objetos pequeños
y la definición de la fuerza del peso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewichtkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz der Gravitation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de poids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">loi d'attraction universelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força do peso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei da gravitação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza del peso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge di gravitazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη βάρους</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος της βαρύτητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza del peso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley de la gravitación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
